Questions.question: Why do you want to work at LawnStarter?
Questions.answer: I'm drawn to LawnStarter because of the opportunity to apply my full-stack skills to a growing company with a tangible impact on people's lives. Your focus on automating and streamlining services aligns perfectly with my passion for building efficient and scalable solutions. I'm particularly excited about the prospect of contributing to a company that is modernizing a traditional industry. I believe my experience with cloud systems will allow me to contribute meaningfully to Lawnstarter's automation efforts.

Questions.question: Describe your experience with Python and React.
Questions.answer: My experience includes developing backend billing and finance systems at Sony using Python (alongside Java Spring Boot), and creating user interfaces with React and Typescript. I am confident in my ability to design and implement scalable and reliable APIs using Python and frameworks such as FastAPI or Django, and create engaging user experiences with React, leveraging libraries such as Redux for state management. I am also experienced in testing and deployment with tools like Jest and Docker.

Questions.question: Tell us about a time you automated a workflow successfully.
Questions.answer: At Sony, I automated the process of delivering sensitive legal documents by designing and architecting a secure web application. This involved building a system to automatically retrieve, encrypt, and distribute documents based on pre-defined rules and user roles. The automated workflow significantly reduced manual effort, improved security, and accelerated document delivery times. I used AWS cloud services to ensure scalability and reliability.

CoverLetter:
Dear LawnStarter Hiring Team,

I am writing to express my enthusiastic interest in the Software Engineer position at LawnStarter. I have been consistently impressed by LawnStarter's innovative approach to the landscaping industry and its commitment to leveraging technology to improve customer experience. The opportunity to contribute to such a forward-thinking company, building scalable APIs and automating workflows, is particularly exciting to me.

My experience as a Tech Lead Engineer at Sony Pictures Entertainment, coupled with my strong foundation in full-stack development, makes me confident in my ability to contribute meaningfully to your team. In my role, I led the design and architecture of a business application for secure legal document delivery, managed production issues, and modernized legacy codebases. These experiences have honed my skills in problem-solving, system design, and working collaboratively within Agile environments.

Specifically, my proficiency in Python, React, and cloud systems aligns perfectly with the requirements outlined in the job description. I have extensive experience developing backend systems with Node.js, Express, and databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB. My project, "Dolores," demonstrates my ability to optimize backends for high traffic, ETL millions of records, implement Redis caching, deploy on AWS (EC2, NGINX), and achieve impressive performance under stress testing. Furthermore, my full-stack projects, "Animedia" and "Bambino," showcase my ability to design and implement user-friendly interfaces with React and Next.js, and securely manage user authentication.

I am eager to learn more about this opportunity and discuss how my skills and experience can benefit LawnStarter. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Yasin Khan

Questions.question: Why are you interested in GreenTech?
Questions.answer: I'm drawn to GreenTech's commitment to sustainability and the opportunity to contribute to a mission-driven organization. The backend developer role specifically excites me because it aligns with my passion for designing scalable and efficient systems, which I believe is crucial for supporting GreenTech's growth and impact. My experience in optimizing backend performance, as demonstrated in the Dolores project, makes me confident I can contribute to GreenTech's success.

Questions.question: Explain your experience with cloud platforms.
Questions.answer: I have hands-on experience with AWS, Firebase, Heroku, and Netlify, deploying and managing applications across various projects. In the Dolores project, I deployed the backend on an AWS EC2 instance, horizontally scaled it, and implemented load balancing with NGINX. Furthermore, I'm proficient in Docker, which I've used to containerize applications for consistent deployment across different cloud environments, ensuring smooth and reliable operations.

Questions.question: Describe a backend project you are proud of.
Questions.answer: I'm particularly proud of the Dolores project where I optimized an existing backend to handle high user traffic. I ETL'd over 10 million records with PostgreSQL and significantly improved performance by implementing Redis data caching, achieving a 60ms response time under heavy stress testing. This project showcases my ability to not only design and deploy backend systems but also to optimize them for scalability and performance, crucial skills for a backend developer at GreenTech.
